description: This Java source file defines a mock class for a Thermostat Cluster, including properties, enums, attribute accessors, and mutators for simulation or testing purposes within a Zigbee-like device framework.

classes.name: MockThermostatCluster
classes.description: A class that simulates a thermostat device's cluster with attributes and control mechanisms, used for testing mutual interactions with a Zigbee or similar protocol.
